name: Marigold Sweetwater
title: Innkeeper
description: A cheerful halfling with rosy cheeks and a welcoming demeanor. Her inn smells of fresh bread and feels like home, no matter where you're from.

greeting.first_time: Oh hello, dear! Welcome to the Grain & Grape! I'm Marigold. Can I get you something? A room? A meal? You look like you could use both!
greeting.returning: Back again! Always lovely to see a friendly face!
greeting.tired: Oh my, you look exhausted, dear! A good night's sleep will do wonders!

main_menu.text: What can I get for you today, dear?

rent_room.text: A room for the night? Just 25 gold—that's our village rate! Includes a hearty breakfast with eggs from our own chickens and bread I baked this morning. You'll sleep like a baby!
rent_room.success: Wonderful! Your room is all ready. Upstairs, first door on the left. Sleep tight!
rent_room.failure: Oh, you'll need 25 gold for a room, dear.

buy_drink.text: How about some of our apple cider? Made locally—sweet and refreshing! Just 3 gold.
buy_drink.failure: It's 3 gold for the cider, love.

ask_about_entertainment.text: Oh, we love music here! Makes the whole village feel alive! Talk to Toby by the door—he books all our performers. Everyone's welcome here, no matter what instrument you play!

goodbye.text: Safe travels, dear! Come back soon!
